content:
The army of the Russian Federation attacked the village of Olgivka of Kherson region, as a result of shelling a woman was killed.

About thisinformsHead of Kherson Ova Alexander Proudin.

According to him, Russian troops hit Olgivka of the Tyaginsky community. Previously, the village was attacked from the drone.

“Two people were injured in the discharge of an explosive object. A 58-year-old woman was killed from the injuries. Her brother, 49 years old, is injured, ”Alexander Proudin emphasized.

As reported by the Armyinform, in Mykolaiv regionEliminatedShahaned, which is stuck in the wind.
title: Russia attacked a village in Kherson region: a woman was killed
description: The chief of Kherson Ova Alexander Proudin informs about it. According to him, Russian ...
author: Army Inform
